attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call on the BBC to include small circulation Newspapers in reviews of these papers who have Larger readerships. We Live in a country that is controlled by interests much more powerful and views outside the accepted view are ignored. I commend this Petition to you that it may attract support inside The House of Commons.

rejection.details: Unfortunately the Government cannot interfere with what is broadcast on television.  Perhaps ask your MP to write to the Director-General there?
